org.keedio.flume.source

类 SQLSourceHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.keedio.flume.source.SQLSourceHelper

  • public class SQLSourceHelper
extends Object
    Helper to manage configuration parameters and utility methods

    Configuration parameters readed from flume configuration file: type: org.keedio.flume.source.SQLSource

    table: table to read from

    columns.to.select: columns to select for import data (* will import all)

    run.query.delay: delay time to execute each query to database

    status.file.path: Directory to save status file

    status.file.name: Name for status file (saves last row index processed)

    batch.size: Batch size to send events from flume source to flume channel

    max.rows: Max rows to import from DB in one query

    custom.query: Custom query to execute to database (be careful)

    作者:
    Marcelo Valle, Luis Lazaro

    • 构造器概要

      Builds an SQLSourceHelper containing the configuration parameters and usefull utils for SQL Source

    • 构造器详细资料

      • SQLSourceHelper

        public SQLSourceHelper(org.apache.flume.Context context,
                       String sourceName)
        Builds an SQLSourceHelper containing the configuration parameters and usefull utils for SQL Source
        参数:
        context - Flume source context, contains the properties from configuration file
        sourceName - source file name for store status

    • 方法详细资料

      • buildQuery

        public String buildQuery()
        查询数据表 --自定义查询或者默认（默认需要制定查询字段和表名）

      • getAllRows

        public List<String[]> getAllRows(List<List<Object>> queryResult)
        Converter from a List of Object List to a List of String arrays

        Useful for csvWriter

        参数:
        queryResult - Query Result from hibernate executeQuery method
        返回:
        A list of String arrays, ready for csvWriter.writeall method
